channel.title: Fixin' Range in Pimpscape?
channel.description: I've got the latest version of Pimpscape, looked through the source a bit, I can't seem to find any problems. However whenever I use range, it says that I have no arrows >.<. Is this a common problem? I have tried changing !hasarrows to without the ! and vice versa, but no luck. Anyone willing to give me a hand? =-)

item.title: Fixin' Range in Pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

I’ve got the latest version of Pimpscape, looked through the source a bit, I can’t seem to find any problems. However whenever I use range, it says that I have no arrows >.<. Is this a common problem? I have tried changing !hasarrows to without the ! and vice versa, but no luck. Anyone willing to give me a hand? =-)
